Articles.Content: Just started KSP,and this appeared in the folder. Did I miss something?
Somebody who has it from KSP store please show us screens,I have it on Steam and just moved it out.
The patcher is supposed to be there. .22 is supposed to include a patcher built in the launcher.

The patcher is supposed to be there. .22 is supposed to include a patcher built in the launcher.

Soooo.0.22 out?
I've had one one of those hanging out in that folder for weeks. I don't think it's new.

I haven't run KSP since yesterday and have a patcher.exe from 8/22 in my folder. I own the game from the KSP store, not steam.

A far better way to see if your game has been patched is to run it and look in the lower left hand corner.
It's used in game, to convert regular conics into patched conics.

I used that to download the last hotfix and possibly 0.21 itself, not sure about the latter but definitely the former. It worked like a charm and made life much easier for me, as opposed to downloading the whole shebang from the KSP store while it was under siege by our fine community.
Lol guys! That patcher has been there and working since like .19! And no .22 is NOT out.
